description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the NASDAQ US Broad Dividend AchieversTM Index.
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in common stocks of companies that comprise the underlying index. Strictly in accordance with its guidelines and mandated procedures, Nasdaq, Inc. ("Nasdaq" or the "index provider") includes common stock in the underlying index pursuant to a proprietary selection methodology that identifies a universe of "Dividend AchieversTM."
